title: Crashes on exit and takes out Explorer too
content: OK, I have never had this happen with Firefox before but it will just freeze, then do nothing then Explorer will crash, every time. I have no idea why its doing this, my drivers are all up to date, Windows is up to date and theres no viruses on my PC. Its annoying.
creator: mazzy2u
